heading: Press Kit
subheading: Everything the press needs to cover SeaNeB.

about.heading: About SeaNeB
paragraphs: SeaNeB (Search Near By) is an Indian tech startup building commission-free digital tools for MSMEs and local businesses. Founded to bridge the gap between local commerce and the digital economy, SeaNeB operates platforms for offers, e-commerce, job listings, and local discovery.
SeaNeB is an initiative by SeaNeB Technologies Pvt. Ltd., a government-recognised startup based in Anand, Gujarat, India.

items.label: Mission
items.value: Empowering local businesses with commission-free digital tools

items.label: Business Model
items.value: Flat subscription – zero commission on transactions
